data.name: Wind Angel Challenge
data.detailed_description:
Wind Angel Challenge is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.
The game is a sequel to the "Wind Angel" series. In this game, players can only challenge bosses, and each level is a different boss.

[Game Control]
Players can control the game through keyboard, keyboard + mouse or gamepad.

[Game Features]
Players will get diamonds when they damage or defeat enemies, and diamonds can be used to strengthen and upgrade.
Enhanced attack: Each enhancement can add a type of bullet, and the more enhancements, the stronger the power.
Enhanced attack speed: It can increase the shooting speed of the protagonist in battle.
Strengthen Life: Increase the life of the protagonist fighter.
Players can also set up different wingmen to fight with the protagonist fighter.

data.short_description: Wind Angel Challenge is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,Windows 8,Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
